law.text: The Solid Waste Services Director, upon request of any person, or otherwise, may pick up and dispose of any animal carcass within the area of his jurisdiction. When the owner of an animal, the carcass of which is disposed of by a public agency, can be identified, he shall be billed for the cost of the disposition. (Code 1959 , ยง4-42; Ord. No. 1998-454, ยง19, 11-4-98)
